function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Nonpharmaceutical policies to combat COVID-19 may increase the rate of incidence of calls to L\\u00ednea 100.","Impact":"Higher call incidence may overwhelm the helpline capacity and lead to inadequate support for individuals seeking help.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to increase helpline capacity and provide additional support resources.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, call center management software, AI-driven support systems.","People":"Individuals seeking help through L\\u00ednea 100.","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, helpline operators, technology providers."},{"Description":"Potential bias due to seasonal effects in calls to the helpline.","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis and conclusions based on biased data.","Mitigation":"Use statistical methods to adjust for seasonal effects and ensure data accuracy.","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, statistical software for seasonal adjustment.","People":"Researchers, data analysts.","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysis teams."},{"Description":"Low call counts in certain states may affect the reliability of the analysis.","Impact":"Reduced reliability of the analysis and conclusions drawn from the data.","Mitigation":"Apply statistical techniques to address the impact of low call counts and consider alternative methods of analysis.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, data imputation techniques.","People":"Statisticians, data analysts, researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysis teams."}]}
